price: Ṣé kí n̄g sọ ẹni tí àwọn èṣù ń sọ̀kalẹ̀ wá bá fún yín?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
